name: blogger
title: Blogger API
description: API for access to the data within Blogger.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

fields.name: blog
fields.desc: The Blog resource.

fields.name: blog_user_info
fields.desc: Information about a User for the Blog.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#blogUserInfo

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: Etag of the response.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The list of Posts for this Blog.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postList

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postUserInfo

fields.name: post
fields.desc: The Post resource.

fields.name: post_user_info
fields.desc: Information about a User for the Post.

fields.name: blogUserInfos
fields.desc: Admin level list of blog per-user information

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The list of Blogs this user has Authorship or Admin rights over.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#blogList

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

fields.name: author
fields.desc: The author of this Comment.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The display name.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the Comment creator.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The comment creator's avatar.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The comment creator's avatar URL.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the Comment creator's Profile page.

fields.name: blog
fields.desc: Data about the blog containing this comment.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the blog containing this comment.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The actual content of the comment. May include HTML markup.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#comment

fields.name: post
fields.desc: Data about the post containing this comment.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the post containing this comment.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this comment was published.

fields.name: status
fields.desc: The status of the comment (only populated for admin users)

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this comment was last updated.

fields.name: inReplyTo
fields.desc: Data about the comment this is in reply to.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identified of the parent of this comment.

fields.name: counts
fields.desc: The container of posts in this blog.

fields.name: count
fields.desc: Count of page views for the given time range

fields.name: timeRange
fields.desc: Time range the given count applies to

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#page_views

fields.name: blogId
fields.desc: Blog Id

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postPerUserInfo

fields.name: postId
fields.desc: ID of the Post resource.

fields.name: userId
fields.desc: ID of the User.

fields.name: blogId
fields.desc: ID of the Blog that the post resource belongs to.

fields.name: hasEditAccess
fields.desc: True if the user has Author level access to the post.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The list of Posts with User information for the post, for this Blog.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postList

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: Etag of the response.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The List of Comments for a Post.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#commentList

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

fields.name: prevPageToken
fields.desc: Pagination token to fetch the previous page, if one exists.

fields.name: images
fields.desc: Display image for the Post.

fields.name: replies
fields.desc: The container of comments on this Post.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: The count of comments on this post.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The List of Comments for this Post.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL of the comments on this post.

fields.name: customMetaData
fields.desc: The JSON meta-data for the Post.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: Etag of the resource.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of this Post.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#post

fields.name: labels
fields.desc: The list of labels this Post was tagged with.

fields.name: location
fields.desc: The location for geotagged posts.

fields.name: span
fields.desc: Location's viewport span. Can be used when rendering a map preview.

fields.name: lat
fields.desc: Location's latitude.

fields.name: lng
fields.desc: Location's longitude.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Location name.

fields.name: titleLink
fields.desc: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

fields.name: author
fields.desc: The author of this Post.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the Post creator.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The Post author's avatar.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The Post author's avatar URL.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the Post creator's Profile page.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The display name.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

fields.name: status
fields.desc: Status of the post. Only set for admin-level requests

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this Post was last updated.

fields.name: blog
fields.desc: Data about the blog containing this Post.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the Blog that contains this Post.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The content of the Post. May contain HTML markup.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this Post was published.

fields.name: readerComments
fields.desc: Comment control and display setting for readers of this post.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The title of the Post.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL where this Post is displayed.

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: This user's locale

fields.name: language
fields.desc: The user's language setting.

fields.name: variant
fields.desc: The user's language variant setting.

fields.name: country
fields.desc: The user's country setting.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

fields.name: created
fields.desc: The timestamp of when this profile was created, in seconds since epoch.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The display name.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#user

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The user's profile page.

fields.name: about
fields.desc: Profile summary information.

fields.name: blogs
fields.desc: The container of blogs for this user.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL of the Blogs for this user.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier for this User.

fields.name: pages
fields.desc: The container of pages in this blog.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL of the container for pages in this blog.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: The count of pages in this blog.

fields.name: posts
fields.desc: The container of posts in this blog.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The List of Posts for this Blog.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The URL of the container for posts in this blog.

fields.name: totalItems
fields.desc: The count of posts in this blog.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

fields.name: status
fields.desc: The status of the blog.

fields.name: customMetaData
fields.desc: The JSON custom meta-data for the Blog

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: The locale this Blog is set to.

fields.name: country
fields.desc: The country this blog's locale is set to.

fields.name: language
fields.desc: The language this blog is authored in.

fields.name: variant
fields.desc: The language variant this blog is authored in.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#blog

fields.name: name
fields.desc: The name of this blog. This is displayed as the title.

fields.name: published
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this blog was published.

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this blog was last updated.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL where this blog is published.

fields.name: description
fields.desc: The description of this blog. This is displayed underneath the title.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#blogPerUserInfo

fields.name: photosAlbumKey
fields.desc: The Photo Album Key for the user when adding photos to the blog

fields.name: role
fields.desc: Access permissions that the user has for the blog (ADMIN, AUTHOR, or READER).

fields.name: userId
fields.desc: ID of the User

fields.name: blogId
fields.desc: ID of the Blog resource

fields.name: hasAdminAccess
fields.desc: True if the user has Admin level access to the blog.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#page

fields.name: published
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this Page was published.

fields.name: status
fields.desc: The status of the page for admin resources (either LIVE or DRAFT).

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The title of this entity. This is the name displayed in the Admin user interface.

fields.name: updated
fields.desc: RFC 3339 date-time when this Page was last updated.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL that this Page is displayed at.

fields.name: blog
fields.desc: Data about the blog containing this Page.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the blog containing this page.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The body content of this Page, in HTML.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: selfLink
fields.desc: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

fields.name: author
fields.desc: The author of this Page.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The display name.

fields.name: id
fields.desc: The identifier of the Page creator.

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The page author's avatar.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The page author's avatar URL.

fields.name: url
fields.desc: The URL of the Page creator's Profile page.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: Etag of the resource.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The list of Pages for a Blog.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#pageList

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

fields.name: etag
fields.desc: Etag of the response.

methods.name: listByBlog
methods.desc: Retrieves the comments for a blog, across all posts, possibly filtered.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch comments from.

optinalQueryParams.name: endDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Latest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBodies
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Continuation token if request is paged.

optinalQueryParams.name: startDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Earliest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

enum.name: emptied
enum.desc: Comments that have had their content removed

enum.name: pending
enum.desc: Comments that are awaiting administrator approval

enum.name: spam
enum.desc: Comments marked as spam by the administrator

methods.name: markAsSpam
methods.desc: Marks a comment as spam.

pathParams.name: commentId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the comment to mark as spam.

methods.name: removeContent
methods.desc: Removes the content of a comment.

pathParams.name: commentId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the comment to delete content from.

methods.name: approve
methods.desc: Marks a comment as not spam.

pathParams.name: commentId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the comment to mark as not spam.

methods.name: delete
methods.desc: Delete a comment by ID.

pathParams.name: commentId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the comment to delete.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one comment by ID.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to containing the comment.

pathParams.name: postId
pathParams.desc: ID of the post to fetch posts from.

pathParams.name: commentId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the comment to get.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level for the requested comment (default: READER). Note that some comments will require elevated permissions, for example comments where the parent posts which is in a draft state, or comments that are pending moderation.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves the comments for a post, possibly filtered.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch comments from.

pathParams.name: postId
pathParams.desc: ID of the post to fetch posts from.

optinalQueryParams.name: startDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Earliest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

enum.name: emptied
enum.desc: Comments that have had their content removed

enum.name: pending
enum.desc: Comments that are awaiting administrator approval

enum.name: spam
enum.desc: Comments marked as spam by the administrator

optinalQueryParams.name: endDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Latest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Continuation token if request is paged.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBodies
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Retrieve pageview stats for a Blog.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the blog to get.

enum.name: 30DAYS
enum.desc: Page view counts from the last thirty days.

enum.name: 7DAYS
enum.desc: Page view counts from the last seven days.

enum.name: all
enum.desc: Total page view counts from all time.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one blog page by ID.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog containing the page.

pathParams.name: pageId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the page to get.

methods.name: insert
methods.desc: Add a page.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to add the page to.

optinalQueryParams.name: isDraft
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether to create the page as a draft (default: false).

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves the pages for a blog, optionally including non-LIVE statuses.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch Pages from.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBodies
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether to retrieve the Page bodies.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of Pages to fetch.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Continuation token if the request is paged.

methods.name: patch
methods.desc: Update a page. This method supports patch semantics.

optinalQueryParams.name: publish
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a publish action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: revert
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a revert action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

methods.name: publish
methods.desc: Publishes a draft page.

methods.name: revert
methods.desc: Revert a published or scheduled page to draft state.

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Update a page.

optinalQueryParams.name: publish
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a publish action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: revert
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a revert action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

methods.name: delete
methods.desc: Delete a page by ID.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one post and user info pair, by post ID and user ID. The post user info contains per-user information about the post, such as access rights, specific to the user.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: ID of the user for the per-user information to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

pathParams.name: postId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the post to get.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxComments
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to pull back on a post.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of post and post user info pairs, possibly filtered. The post user info contains per-user information about the post, such as access rights, specific to the user.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: ID of the user for the per-user information to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch posts from.

enum.name: scheduled
enum.desc: Posts that are scheduled to publish in future.

optinalQueryParams.name: endDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Latest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBodies
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of posts is included. Default is false.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of posts to fetch.

optinalQueryParams.name: orderBy
optinalQueryParams.desc: Sort order applied to search results. Default is published.

enum.name: published
enum.desc: Order by the date the post was published

enum.name: updated
enum.desc: Order by the date the post was last updated

optinalQueryParams.name: startDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Earliest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

optinalQueryParams.name: labels
optinalQueryParams.desc: Comma-separated list of labels to search for.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Continuation token if the request is paged.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

methods.name: delete
methods.desc: Delete a post by ID.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Get a post by ID.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch the post from.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBody
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of the post is included (default: true). This should be set to false when the post bodies are not required, to help minimize traffic.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchImages
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: maxComments
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to pull back on a post.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of posts, possibly filtered.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch posts from.

optinalQueryParams.name: endDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Latest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchImages
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of posts to fetch.

optinalQueryParams.name: orderBy
optinalQueryParams.desc: Sort search results

enum.name: published
enum.desc: Order by the date the post was published

enum.name: updated
enum.desc: Order by the date the post was last updated

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: Continuation token if the request is paged.

optinalQueryParams.name: status
optinalQueryParams.desc: Statuses to include in the results.

enum.name: scheduled
enum.desc: Posts that are scheduled to publish in the future.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require escalated access.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBodies
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of posts is included (default: true). This should be set to false when the post bodies are not required, to help minimize traffic.

optinalQueryParams.name: labels
optinalQueryParams.desc: Comma-separated list of labels to search for.

optinalQueryParams.name: startDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Earliest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

methods.name: patch
methods.desc: Update a post. This method supports patch semantics.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBody
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of the post is included with the result (default: true).

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchImages
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included in the returned result (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: maxComments
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to retrieve with the returned post.

optinalQueryParams.name: publish
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a publish action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: revert
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a revert action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

methods.name: revert
methods.desc: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state.

methods.name: getByPath
methods.desc: Retrieve a Post by Path.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch the post from.

requiredQueryParams.name: path
requiredQueryParams.desc: Path of the Post to retrieve.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxComments
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to pull back on a post.

methods.name: insert
methods.desc: Add a post.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to add the post to.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBody
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of the post is included with the result (default: true).

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchImages
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included in the returned result (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: isDraft
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether to create the post as a draft (default: false).

methods.name: publish
methods.desc: Publishes a draft post, optionally at the specific time of the given publishDate parameter.

optinalQueryParams.name: publishDate
optinalQueryParams.desc: Optional date and time to schedule the publishing of the Blog. If no publishDate parameter is given, the post is either published at the a previously saved schedule date (if present), or the current time. If a future date is given, the post will be scheduled to be published.

methods.name: search
methods.desc: Search for a post.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: ID of the blog to fetch the post from.

requiredQueryParams.name: q
requiredQueryParams.desc: Query terms to search this blog for matching posts.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBodies
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of posts is included (default: true). This should be set to false when the post bodies are not required, to help minimize traffic.

optinalQueryParams.name: orderBy
optinalQueryParams.desc: Sort search results

enum.name: published
enum.desc: Order by the date the post was published

enum.name: updated
enum.desc: Order by the date the post was last updated

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Update a post.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchBody
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the body content of the post is included with the result (default: true).

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchImages
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included in the returned result (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: maxComments
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of comments to retrieve with the returned post.

optinalQueryParams.name: publish
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a publish action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

optinalQueryParams.name: revert
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether a revert action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one user by ID.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the user to get.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one blog and user info pair by blogId and userId.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: ID of the user whose blogs are to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the blog to get.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxPosts
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of posts to pull back with the blog.

methods.name: getByUrl
methods.desc: Retrieve a Blog by URL.

requiredQueryParams.name: url
requiredQueryParams.desc: The URL of the blog to retrieve.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the blog. Note that some fields require elevated access.

methods.name: listByUser
methods.desc: Retrieves a list of blogs, possibly filtered.

pathParams.name: userId
pathParams.desc: ID of the user whose blogs are to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the blogs. Note that some fields require elevated access.

optinalQueryParams.name: fetchUserInfo
optinalQueryParams.desc: Whether the response is a list of blogs with per-user information instead of just blogs.

optinalQueryParams.name: role
optinalQueryParams.desc: User access types for blogs to include in the results, e.g. AUTHOR will return blogs where the user has author level access. If no roles are specified, defaults to ADMIN and AUTHOR roles.

enum.name: ADMIN
enum.desc: Admin role - Blogs where the user has Admin level access.

enum.name: AUTHOR
enum.desc: Author role - Blogs where the user has Author level access.

enum.name: READER
enum.desc: Reader role - Blogs where the user has Reader level access (to a private blog).

optinalQueryParams.name: status
optinalQueryParams.desc: Blog statuses to include in the result (default: Live blogs only). Note that ADMIN access is required to view deleted blogs.

enum.name: DELETED
enum.desc: Blog has been deleted by an administrator.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Gets one blog by ID.

pathParams.name: blogId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the blog to get.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxPosts
optinalQueryParams.desc: Maximum number of posts to pull back with the blog.

optinalQueryParams.name: view
optinalQueryParams.desc: Access level with which to view the blog. Note that some fields require elevated access.
